channel.title: -Request- forums Point exchange panel
channel.description:
Hi, I was just wondering if anyone had a Point exchange panel for forums - i have the mubby-pk one but need an updated one that i can add into my forums or if anyone has a more resent forum with a point panel included.
Or if anyone can tell me how to impliment one e.g the files that would need to be edited i would be very greatful.
Thanks for looking :D

Ecko How about sharing it:)
[/quote]

Figgy is the one who created the point system, and I’m not gonna release something that’s not mine to release.[/quote]

If anyone can get intouch with figgy and ask him permission i will pay for the source.

Thanks for looking

item.title: -Request- forums Point exchange panel
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

I told you I will do it but what you were asking simply was not easy (such as seeing their exact stats as soon as they get it in-game). If you’re fine with it being whilst they’re offline I will do it no problem.

If he wants it like google source. then it’ll be lougged out, only thing is that you couldn’t loug in wildy and change stats.
You had to be outside of wild and louged out.

Read full topic

item.title: -Request- forums Point exchange panel
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

If anyone can code a forum point panel with the following included i will pay £££…

1. Must look good and include drop menu's for Att, Def, Str, Ranged, Magic, Prayer - automatically calc hits depending on selected stats.
2. Show levels available depending on the amount of points a person has up to 125 lvls (basically like google source)
3. Not be available(able to view) when player is in wilderness or logged into the server. - this will take some server side adjustments i am told.
4. Show the amount of Points a player has.
5. Show the players combat level.
6. Be secure. No injections or bugs.

If you can manage to do this then pm me.

I will pay well.

Thanks for looking

Read full topic

item.title: -Request- forums Point exchange panel
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:10, topic:324031”]I was looking into this when i was using easyrsc but i was out of my depth so thats why i decided to see if anyone had a forum panel - its easy to draw the ingame control pannel and get it to load via an Fkey but i was stuck on how to make it do what i wanted and how to impliment the points to exp forumulae so i gave up on that for now lol.

Thanks for looking :D[/quote]

int calculation = (player.getExp(0) - Formulae.lvlToXp(player.getMaxStat(0) + 1)) / 500;

500XP per point, not hard at all.

Read full topic

item.title: -Request- forums Point exchange panel
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:10, topic:324031”]I was looking into this when i was using easyrsc but i was out of my depth so thats why i decided to see if anyone had a forum panel - its easy to draw the ingame control pannel and get it to load via an Fkey but i was stuck on how to make it do what i wanted and how to impliment the points to exp forumulae so i gave up on that for now lol.

Thanks for looking :D[/quote]

I am working on a easyrsc points server with client side control panel, but instead of using the clients in built gfx I will be using swing. I am planning on releasing the source but I don’t know when I will be done since I only have maybe n hour or 2 a day to work on it.

Read full topic
